text: Except as otherwise provided in the organic law or organic rules of a domestic entity, approval of a transaction under this chapter by the unanimous vote or consent of its interest holders shall satisfy this chapter for approval of the transaction.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-201.08 has been recodified as § 29A-201.08.

DC CODE § 29-201.08

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Alternative means of approval of transactions.
